MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G74 postcode area of East Kilbride, affecting properties in Dundas Court and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.51pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.59pm on Thursday 25 February 2021.
